per-garden hat hierarchies with role-based access control **Hat Tree Structure:** ``` Green Goods Top Hat (Tree 92 on Arbitrum) \u2514\u2500\u2500 Gardens Hat (parent for all gardens)     \u2514\u2500\u2500 Garden Hat (per-garden root)         \u251c\u2500\u2500 Operator Hat (can mint Gardener/Evaluator)         \u251c\u2500\u2500 Gardener Hat (minted by Operator)         \u251c\u2500\u2500 Evaluator Hat (minted by Operator)         \u251c\u2500\u2500 Funder Hat (eligibility-based)         \u2514\u2500\u2500 Community Hat (token-gated) ``` **Security:** - Only GardenToken can create hat trees - Only garden owner can grant/revoke Operator role - Operators can grant/revoke Gardener/Evaluator roles - Funder/Community roles use eligibility modules","events":{"AdminChanged(address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when the admin account has changed."},"BeaconUpgraded(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the beacon is grant"}},"hasHatTree(address)":{"params":{"garden":"The garden address"},"returns":{"_0":"True if the garden has a hat tree"}},"hasRole(address,address,uint8)":{"params":{"account":"The account to operator"}},"joinGarden(address)":{"details":"Checks IGardenAccount(garden).openJoining() and grants gardener hat","params":{"garden":"The garden address to join"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"proxiableUUID()":{"details":"Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"revokeRole(address,address,uint8)":{"params":{"account":"The account to revoke the role from","garden":"The garden address","role":"The role to revoke"}},"setEligibilityModule(address,uint8,address)":{"details":"Used for Funder (Octant/Hypercerts) and Community (token-gating) roles","params":{"garden":"The garden address","module":"The eligibility module address","role":"The role to configure"}},"setGardenToken(address)":{"params":{"_gardenToken":"The new GardenToken address"}},"setGardensHatId(uint256)":{"params":{"_gardensHatId":"The parent hat ID for all gardens"}},"setHatsContract(address)":{"params":{"_hats":"The new Hats contract address"}},"setKarmaGAPModule(address)":{"params":{"_karmaGAPModule":"The KarmaGAPModule address"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). params.accounts: The accounts to grant roles to
params.roles: The roles to grant (parallel array with accounts)

params.accounts: The accounts to revoke roles from
params.roles: The roles to revoke (parallel array with accounts)

createGardenHatTree(address,address,stri.details: Called by GardenToken during garden minting

params.gardenName: The garden name (used for hat details)

params.role: The role to get the hat ID for

returns._0: The hat ID for the role

grantRole(address,address,uint8).details: For Operator: only garden owner can grantFor Gardener/Evaluator: only operator can grant

params.account: The account to grant the role to

returns._0: True if the garden has a hat tree
True if the account has the role

initialize(address,address,uint256).details: gardenToken must be set via setGardenToken() after deployment

params._gardensHatId: The parent hat ID for all gardens (0 for testnet)

returns._0: True if the account is an evaluator
True if the account is a gardener
True if the account is an operator

joinGarden(address).details: Checks IGardenAccount(garden).openJoining() and grants gardener hat

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.account: The account to revoke the role from

setEligibilityModule(address,uint8,addre.details: Used for Funder (Octant/Hypercerts) and Community (token-gating) roles

params._gardensHatId: The parent hat ID for all gardens

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

batchGrantRoles(address,address[],uint8[.notice: Batch grants roles to multiple accounts

batchRevokeRoles(address,address[],uint8.notice: Batch revokes roles from multiple accounts

createGardenHatTree(address,address,stri.notice: Creates a hat tree for a new garden

gardensHatId().notice: The parent hat ID for all gardens (child of top hat)

getGardenHatTree(address).notice: Gets the complete hat tree for a garden

getRoleHatId(address,uint8).notice: Gets the hat ID for a specific role in a garden

grantRole(address,address,uint8).notice: Grants a role to an account

hasHatTree(address).notice: Checks if a garden has a hat tree

hasRole(address,address,uint8).notice: Checks if an account has a specific role in a garden

isEvaluator(address,address).notice: Checks if an account is an evaluator of a garden

isGardener(address,address).notice: Checks if an account is a gardener of a garden

isOperator(address,address).notice: Checks if an account is an operator of a garden

joinGarden(address).notice: Allows anyone to join a garden as a gardener if open joining is enabled

karmaGAPModule().notice: KarmaGAPModule for syncing GAP project admins

revokeRole(address,address,uint8).notice: Revokes a role from an account

setEligibilityModule(address,uint8,addre.notice: Sets the eligibility module for a role

setHatsContract(address).notice: Set the Hats Protocol contract address
